Name: Order VI
Desc:
Orders Ether Swords created with Creation to chase down an enemy. Can only be used when there is an Ether Sword created with Creation.
Ether Swords only move near Adele, and follow Adele when moving out of range to track down new enemies.
Ether Swords don't affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status and only track down enemies when Adele is in combat.
Ether can be obtained based on the remaining duration if an Ether Sword disappears while tracking.
Required Skill: Order Lv. 20 or higher

H.Old:
MP Cost: 52. Ether Cost: 100.
Each Ether Sword exists for 60 sec. and attacks at 800% damage 2 times.
Up to 6 swords can be ordered at once. When giving order beyond the maximum count removes the next Ether Sword to expire.
15% chance to create an Ether Crystal when attack hits.
Cooldown: 500 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 52. Ether Cost: 100.
Each Ether Sword exists for 60 sec., attacking at 800% Damage 2 times.
Up to 6 swords can be ordered at once. When giving order beyond the maximum count removes the next Ether Sword to expire.
Successful attacks create a 15% chance of creating an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 500 sec.
